TypeSignature.Value: public struct SqlString : IComparable, System.Data.SqlTypes.INullable, System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable

.class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit SqlString extends System.ValueType implements class System.Data.SqlTypes.INullable, class System.IComparable, class System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable
Public Structure SqlString Implements IComparable, INullable, IXmlSerializable
public value class SqlString : IComparable, System::Data::SqlTypes::INullable, System::Xml::Serialization::IXmlSerializable

summary.span: 表示要存储在数据库中或从数据库中检索的字符的可变长度流。

span.span: Represents a variable-length stream of characters to be stored in or retrieved from the database.

summary.span: 具有与其相应的 .NET Framework 数据类型不同的基础数据结构。

span.span: has a different underlying data structure from its corresponding .NET Framework data type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 始终使用默认值从当前线程，但包含自己的区域设置 Id 和比较标志。 always uses the default from the current thread, but contains its own locale Id and compare flags. 两个比较结果结构是独立于操作系统和当前线程区域设置。The comparison result of two structures is independent of operating system and current thread locale. 当你使用比较运算符，请注意，是否自变量的 Lcid 不同，比较函数引发异常，因为它们不能进行比较。When you use comparison operators, note that if the LCIDs of arguments are different, comparison functions throw an exception because they cannot be compared. 例如，语句For example, the statement ``` SqlString mySqlString = new SqlString("abc"); ``` 等效于is equivalent to ``` SqlString mySqlString = new SqlString("abc", CultureInfo.CurrentCulture.LCID); ```

summary.span: 获取 结构，它表示有关此 对象的区域性信息。

span.span: Gets the structure that represents information about the culture of this object.

value.span: 一个 结构，描述有关此 SqlString 结构的区域性的信息，包括区域性的名称、书写体系和使用的日历，还包括对特定于区域性对象的访问，这些对象提供常规运算的方法，例如格式化日期和排序字符串。

span.span: A structure that describes information about the culture of this SqlString structure including the names of the culture, the writing system, and the calendar used, and also access to culture-specific objects that provide methods for common operations, such as formatting dates and sorting strings.

MemberSignature.Value: public static readonly int IgnoreKanaType;
.field public static initonly int32 IgnoreKanaType
Public Shared ReadOnly IgnoreKanaType As Integer
public: static initonly int IgnoreKanaType;

summary.span: 指定字符串比较必须忽略假名类型。

span.span: Specifies that the string comparison must ignore the Kana type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 假名类型是指日语平假名和片假名字符，它们表示日语中的语音。Kana type refers to Japanese hiragana and katakana characters that represent phonetic sounds in the Japanese language. 平假名用于表示日语自有的短语和字词，而片假名用于表示从其他语言借用的字词，如“computer”或“Internet”。Hiragana is used for native Japanese expressions and words, while katakana is used for words borrowed from other languages, such as "computer" or "Internet". 语音既可以用平假名也可以用片假名表示。A phonetic sound can be expressed in both hiragana and katakana. 如果选择该值，则认为一个语音的平假名字符等于同一语音的片假名字符。If this value is selected, the hiragana character for one sound is considered equal to the katakana character for the same sound. 充当的常量类。 functions as a constant for the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public static readonly int IgnoreNonSpace;
.field public static initonly int32 IgnoreNonSpace
Public Shared ReadOnly IgnoreNonSpace As Integer
public: static initonly int IgnoreNonSpace;

summary.span: 指定字符串比较必须忽略非空格组合字符，比如音调符号。

span.span: Specifies that the string comparison must ignore non-space combining characters, such as diacritics.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Unicode 标准将组合字符定义为与基字符组合起来产生新字符的字符。The Unicode Standard defines combining characters as characters that are combined with base characters to produce a new character. 非空格组合字符在呈现时本身不占用字符空间。Non-space combining characters do not use character space by themselves when rendered. 非空格组合字符有关的详细信息，请参阅 Unicode 标准的http://www.unicode.org。For more information about non-space combining characters, see the Unicode Standard at http://www.unicode.org. 充当的常量类。 functions as a constant for the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public static readonly int IgnoreWidth;
.field public static initonly int32 IgnoreWidth
Public Shared ReadOnly IgnoreWidth As Integer
public: static initonly int IgnoreWidth;

summary.span: 指定字符串比较必须忽略字符宽度。

span.span: Specifies that the string comparison must ignore the character width.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，日语片假名字符可以写为全角或半角形式；如果选择该值，则认为写为全角形式的片假名字符等于写为半角形式的同一字符。For example, Japanese katakana characters can be written as full-width or half-width and, if this value is selected, the katakana characters written as full-width are considered equal to the same characters written in half-width. 充当的常量类。 functions as a constant for the class.
